message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
Alice, that's a great start, but I'm looking to spend closer to $1000000. Would you be willing to come down to $1050000?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $1100000 to make it worth my while.
